alert.note: Alert for Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 8:10PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern St. Johns County through 845 PM EDT... At 810 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Saint Augustine to near Saint Augustine Shores to Marineland. Movement was northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds around 40 mph and excessive cloud-to-ground lightning. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Excessive cloud-to-ground lightning is occurring. Locations impacted include... Saint Augustine, Saint Augustine Beach, Crescent Beach, Saint Augustine Shores, Butler Beach, Saint Augustine South, Vilano Beach, Anastasia and Dupont Center. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Coastal St. Johns; Inland St. Johns
